alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; Northern Livingston; St. Helena (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 4:28PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern St. Helena, northwestern Livingston, southeastern East Feliciana and northeastern East Baton Rouge Parishes through 530 PM CDT... At 427 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pride, or 12 miles north of Denham Springs, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Zachary, Slaughter, Watson, Greenwell Spring and Pride. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; Northern Livingston; St. Helena
